data.title: Mike Wallace Signs with Ravens: Latest Contract Details, Comments and Reaction
data.meta_description: Pro Bowl wide receiver  Mike Wallace  is among the fastest, most gifted playmakers in football, but he'll be playing for a third team in as many seasons in 2016...
data.text:
I was disappointed and, really, I'm disappointed more so that it wasn't the season that he wanted or we wanted. I say this from my heart: I love this kid, I love the way he works, I love the way he competes. I texted him last night basically and told him the same thing.

I said, "You know, I know this wasn't exactly how we planned it out." But I love him as a person, a competitor, a football player and Iâ€™m disappointed that it didn't pan out the way I envisioned it and that really and honestly, he's always going to be one of my kind of guys. I like this kid.
